import React from "react"; import { useEffect, useState, createElement } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min"; import { Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min"; const p = (a) => { console.log(a); }; const About = (props) => { const [frontEndItem, setFrontEndItem] = useState([ { title: "Create-React-App", about: "React", link: "React", }, { title: "Bootstrap", about: "The world’s most popular front-end open source toolkit.", link: "https://getbootstrap.com/", }, ]); const [backEndItem, setBackEndItem] = useState([ { title: "Mongo DB", about: "A non-relational database that plays well with json. ", link: "", }, { title: "Mongoose", about: "A database helper", link: "", }, ]); return ( <>
